group_1.textLeft: Anywho, that's everything this cutie found out@about the Takarazaki Witch after that.
So what've you two learned, Shigurin, Hagurin?

group_1.textRight: I think...it's probably true that crimes and@accidents have increased recently...

group_1.textLeft: 'Cause Hagurin got robbed?

group_1.textRight: No, I looked it up on forums and social media...
I searched using keywords with Takarazaki like@"crime", "accident", "theft" and "altercation"...
It looks like there's been a big spike recently...
Oh, is that...what was it called again?@"Big Data"...?
Like when you do a search and all kinds of@things reveal themselves?

group_1.textLeft: No, I can't do that kind of thing... I just checked@the dates.
And I saw there was an increase...
That's good enough evidence for me★
I couldn't tell if it was true after just listening@to that instructor.
How 'bout you, Hagurin?

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry, the only thing I could do was to@think about the issue...
But, all I came up with in the end was that@it's a little weird.

group_1.textLeft: Weird...?

group_1.textRight: Yes, if this is the work of a Witch, wouldn't it@be more life-threatening?
But instead, most of the problems happening@in Takarazaki are small crimes and accidents.
I thought that maybe, this has nothing to do@with a Witch...

group_1.textLeft: I thought the same thing!
For real, aren't us cuties on the totally same@wavelength?

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah, I guess we are...?
But, I don't have any definitive proof that it's not@a Witch, you know?

group_1.textLeft: Well, me neither.
On the other hand, there's no proof that it IS@a Witch either, is there?

group_1.textRight: I thought we were going somewhere with this,@but...
Doesn't this mean we haven't made any progress@at all...?
I have no idea what to do...

group_1.textLeft: Me neither★

group_1.textRight: Eh...? Is that it, then...?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, gimme a sec...

Yeah...[chara:102801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]okay...[chara:102801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]uh-huh...[chara:102801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]I think that's good, too.

group_1.textRight: Your boyfriend?

group_1.textLeft: Yup, he says, why don't we try hypothesis busting@next?

group_1.textRight: Hypothesis-busting?

group_1.textLeft: Meaning, investigating a prediction to see@what actually happens.
First off, there's the problem the instructor@mentioned.

group_1.textCenter: Which makes this a rather complicated and@difficult task.
There's been a greater increase in crime than@Witches. It doesn't conform to normal trends.

group_1.textRight: But if Witches aren't behind this, like you two@suspect...
Then nothing we can do would make@any difference...

group_1.textLeft: C'mon, we'll never get anywhere if you keep@thinking like that.
That instructor thought it was because of the@growing number of Witches...
But T-B-H, it's possible there's just one big,@nasty Witch behind it.
And she just assumed there were lots of Witches.

group_1.textRight: So you're saying we should start making@hypotheses, and then try to disprove them...?

group_1.textLeft: Yup★ Anyway, we gotta try something.

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: So for today, why don't you two go look for@some strong Witches?

group_1.textRight: Huh, just us?
What would we do if we ran into a really strong@Witch...?

group_1.textLeft: Hagurin's ability has a special effect on Witches,@so it'll be easy-peasy!

group_1.textRight: B-but...what will you do...?

group_1.textLeft: Brain play with bae!
We'll be planning our next move in my head.
[chara:102801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]You two are gonna be my arms and legs,@so do your best!★

group_1.textRight: [chara:102901:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]...
Then, Shigure...
It'll take too long if we move together,@so how about we split up and search?
Then, if we sense any strong magic,@let's contact each other and regroup.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, oh... Okay...
